description.narrative: UNICEF program of cooperation is adequately resourced the resources are used for intended purposes and stakeholders receive timely quality reports., which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

title.narrative: Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF program of cooperation is adequately resourced; the resources are used for intended purposes and stakeholders receivetimely quality reports.

description.narrative: By end of2021, ACO had raised US$ 672m against a budget of US$448m, with an additional US$200 in firm pipeline, andUS$778m in soft pipeline, starting 2022 with a programmable balance of $559m across all funding types. Since the August 2021 crisis, there has been a significant increase in volume and value of activity, with double the numbers of donor submissions and contracts, a tenfold increase in value of proposals, and a sixfold increase in pipeline compared to 2020. ACO has further developed important funding partnerships with all the top donors to Afghanistan. ACO submitted 99% of reports on time. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/01/2022

title.narrative: Number of donor reports currently overdue(63021), Number
